page.title: 11Whalley Preschool Playgroup
page.content: {Whalley Playgroup}meets at the{Old {Grammar School,}Station Rd.,Whalley.At present there are 54 children on the register.The ages of the children are between{2 yrs 9 months and 5 yrs.}The children can attend 3/4 sessions of 2 hours at a cost of 80p per session. There are 4{supervisors}and{25 children at each session.In all there are 6 supervisors who alternate between sessions. The group is a member of the P.P.A. {(Preschool Playgroup Association). It is a registered{charity}and the parents form a committee to raise funds to buy the necessary equipment. During the sessions the children will play with games,the water and sand trays-if sunny they will play on tricycles outside.They are given {opportunities}to paint,build,draw,sing and be told stories.
